synopsis.text: Ohana Matsumae, a typical 16-year-old girl with dreams and aspirations, finds her life taking an unexpected turn when her mother and boyfriend flee to evade debts, leaving her under the care of her distant grandmother. Arriving in the countryside, Ohana is thrust into a world far removed from her previous life, as she is compelled to work at her grandmother's traditional hot spring inn, Kissuisou. Initially struggling to adapt to her new environment and facing hostility from her grandmother and coworkers, Ohana resolves to embrace her challenging circumstances and transform herself for the better, while striving to mend her strained relationships at the inn and forge a brighter future.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
